answers.answer: How far along are you? My dr said if I had any changes inu vision to call immediately. I'm in my third trimester
I'm 19w1d like it's not blurry but it's not my normal eyesight idk I can't explain it
I know that when ur eye sight is affected it can be because of preeclampsia. Not sure if that's what's going on with you but just a thought. You should just let ur Dr know and see what they tell you
I saw that online which really freaks me out and I am definitely calling in the morning
I also think I might have preeclampsia I will be asking my Dr tomorrow!! Hope everything goes well with you girly :)!
Yeah I would defiantly call in the morning because the way my dr made it sound it could be serious. But then again it could be nothing but better safe then sorry. Good luck hun

question: Almost all day my eyesight has been kind of blurry like I can see but my eyes just feel weird. Does thishave something to do with baby? I've never had this before and I have 20/20 vision.
title: Blurry vision
